The Wedding

We are getting married! Liane Manuela Matthes & Zachary Alexander Gemmell will finally say "yes" on Dec 7th, 2018, and would like to share this special moment with our loved ones.

When

December 7th, 2018
2:45 PM

Where

1167 Solana Dr
Del Mar, CA 92014

RSVP

Timeline

2:45 - 3:00pm / Wedding Guest Arrival

We are happy to announce that our family friend Marti graciously offered to host our wedding at her beautiful Balinese style home in Del Mar. Upon arrival, you will be divided into two teams: Team Liane and Team Zack (the rest will be a surprise!).

3:15pm / Ceremony starts

The couple will be wed in Marti's gorgeous courtyard amongst blooming bottle brush and banana trees. We will have heaters and blankets available just in case it is cold out.

3:45pm / Cocktail hour & Picture Taking

Enjoy appetizers and drinks while the bride & groom take pictures with the wedding guests. Unfortunately day light will be gone by 4:40pm limiting the photoshoot, but the cocktail hour will continue.

6:00pm / Dinner starts

We will serve some of our favorite Moroccan Food & hope you will enjoy it too.

6:30pm / Toasts

We are delighted if you feel inclined to make a toast. If so, please let us know ahead of time.

7:00pm / Dinner ends

The winning team will be announced! Thereafter, we will dance, eat cake, laugh and enjoy the evening. We hope to make it at least past midnight!

We are so happy that youâ€™ll be able to join us for our wedding. As many of you know, we live in a small apartment, and it is already filled with all the things we could ever need to make it a home. While the presence of your company is the only gift we could ever ask for, we have set up registries for those who have expressed an interest in offering a gift to mark the occasion.
